abstract: Principal-level iOS UI review and refactoring guide for SwiftUI, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 48 rules across 8 categories ordered by the visual review process: visual hierarchy (CRITICAL), typography discipline (CRITICAL), color system (CRITICAL), motion and animation (HIGH), screen transitions (HIGH), materials and depth (HIGH), spacing and rhythm (MEDIUM-HIGH), and iOS 17+ modernization (MEDIUM). Each rule identifies a specific anti-pattern, explains the design impact, and provides the correct iOS 17+ SwiftUI implementation while preserving brand identity.
